description: Wine cellar manager for Android Cavity is a wine cellar manager for Android. A stock management app for wine cellars that lets you always pick the right bottle at the right time. Features: * Stock management * Highlights peaking bottles * Stock history * Handle friends (Give a bottle to someone, share with a friend...) * Buy & consumptions stats * Search * Tasting sessions: decanting notification, chill a bottle * Auto online backups (optional: requires an account)
